Uses of Package
org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit

  • Packages that use org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit
    Core actuator auditing classes.
    org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit.listener
    Actuator auditing listeners.
    org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.audit
    Auto-configuration for actuator audit concerns.
    org.springframework.boot.actuate.security
    Actuator support for security.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit used by org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit 
    Class and Description
    AuditEvent
    A value object representing an audit event: at a particular time, a particular user or agent carried out an action of a particular type.
    AuditEventRepository
    Repository for AuditEvents.
    AuditEventsEndpoint.AuditEventsDescriptor
    A description of an application's audit events.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit used by org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit.listener 
    Class and Description
    AuditEvent
    A value object representing an audit event: at a particular time, a particular user or agent carried out an action of a particular type.
    AuditEventRepository
    Repository for AuditEvents.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit used by org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.audit 
    Class and Description
    AuditEventRepository
    Repository for AuditEvents.
    AuditEventsEndpoint
    @Endpoint to expose audit events.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.actuate.audit used by org.springframework.boot.actuate.security 
    Class and Description
    AuditEvent
    A value object representing an audit event: at a particular time, a particular user or agent carried out an action of a particular type.
